metadata.Title: CVE-2015-7695 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: The PDO adapters in Zend Framework before 1.12.16 do not filer null bytes in SQL statements, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via a crafted query.

criterions.comment: zend-framework: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
